text: This is the nearest Philippe has ever been to my house. Like, a damn hour away. So close.

name: bilingualmonkey
text: Strangely, there's a takeaway outlet called 'Ali G's' directly opposite the castle on the hill. But I suppose Onstad knows this. Oh, the fun of it all.

name: tekende
text: Okay, does anyone know what that sign is actually supposed to represent? I can't think of any situation it might resemble.

name: nice-on-water
text: Cars and motorbikes allowed on this road?

name: tekende
text: I suppose that makes sense, yeah.

name: nice-on-water
text: If you'd prefer to think it means "motorbikes are permitted to jump cars on this road", I can't blame you and would like to join you to that wonderful place.

name: tekende
text: Great. I'll be at the bar.

name: cagliostro
text: Bizarrely enough, it actually means 'no motor vehicles allowed'. Go figure.
